original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 10.17. Sanidassanattika, Piṭṭhiduka
analyzed: sani dassana ttika piṭṭhi duka

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sani dassana sa paṭigham na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Piṭṭhidukaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa piṭṭhidukam vitthāretabba

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
analyzed: na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na a nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha

original: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam ca na anidassana appaṭigham na saraṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam ca na a nidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa sabbattha vitthāro

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na araṇam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigha

original: naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṁsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava sahajāta vāre pi paccaya vāre pi nissaya vāre pi sa saṭṭha vāre pi sampayutta vāre pi sabbattha nava
